name: Bujin Torifune
text: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 2 "Bujin" monsters with different Types from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Bujin Torifune". When you Xyz Summon a "Bujin" Xyz Monster while this card is in your GY: You can equip this card to that monster. Banish any monster destroyed by battle with the equipped monster. You can only use each effect of "Bujin Torifune" once per turn.
